data.meta_site_name: First Fuel & Propane - Dependable Propane and Fuel Service
data.text:
Propane delivery in Sheffield, Egremont, Great Barrington, Alford, Stockbridge, Lenox, Richmond, Pittsfield, Hancock, Lanesborough, New Ashford, and Williamstown, MA

At First Fuel & Propane, we will treat you like family. In addition, we will save you money and provide you with the best service. We have been delivering propane up and down New York State for more than twenty years. We now proudly offer the same great service in Berkshire County, Massachusetts.

You can count on our family-owned company to deliver propane to your home or office. Whether you are in Sheffield, Egremont, Great Barrington, Alford, Stockbridge, Lenox, Richmond, Pittsfield, Hancock, Lanesborough, New Ashford, and Williamstown, MA, First Fuel and Propane is your best choice. Learn more about our company by visiting our about us page. Alternatively, give us a call. We look forward to speaking with you.

Call now for our best price 518.828.8700

Meet your energy needs at an affordable price

First Fuel & Propane provides service twenty four hours a day and seven days a week. In addition, we offer automatic delivery, budget and pre-payment plans. Our goal is to provide your home or business with the most convenient propane services.

Save money on propane in Massachusetts

Richard Coon started his business in 1993. Richard is still at the helm and now our family stands with him. It is our goal to help our local communities. See how you can save money by visiting the propane specials page.

Berkshire County loves First Fuel and Propane

We have customers throughout Berkshire County, Massachusetts. This includes Sheffield, Egremont, Great Barrington, Alford, Stockbridge, Lenox, Richmond, Pittsfield, Hancock, Lanesborough, New Ashford, and Williamstown. We are community-minded. We will help you take care of your energy needs. Contact us today at 518 828 8700.
